title: How to earn money from parenting blogs - Quora

response.answer_text: Parenting is a paying niche. It suits mothers and pediatricians. They can relate their experiences, network with others, and share important matters relating to parenting. Comapnies selling items relating to children’s food, clothing, play and health are keen to advertise on parenting blogs. Since these blogs are visited by real parents, the chances of clicks and buys from such blogs are very high. However, because of the advantages of parenting blogs, thousands of mothers have opened such blogs. That is leading to a bit of saturation. However, you can think of adding local flavor and talking of matters that have not been dealt with by others. You can perhaps blog in your local language where competition may be much less than in English. For actual monetization, you can think of: AdSenseAffiliate adsDirect adsGetting semples from companies and reviewing the productsDirect sale of special merchandise through blog and offering discount for that

Do you mean that you have a parenting blog yourself? If yes, then you can definitely make a good amount of money from a parenting blog when done correctly. Combine a blog filled with high quality content and the affiliate marketing business model and a social media presence and you can’t go wrong. Good Luck
